#summary Instructions for DRControl
==DESCRIPTION==

DRControl is Python script that controls the USB Relay board from Denkovi [www.denkovi.com].

==REQUIREMENTS==

  * Python 2.6+
  * Tested on Raspberry Pi with Python 2.6
  * Tested on Mac OSX 10.8.2 with Python 2.7.2
  * Tested on Ubuntu 12.04 Desktop (via VMWare)
  * Denkovi 4 USB Relay Board, product code DAE-CB/Ro4-USB

==DRCONTROL.PY==

Options;

||-d||Device||
||-r||Relay number||
||-s||Relay state||
||-l||List all available FTDI devices||
||-v||Verbose, print status and information on stdout||

=== Device (-d) ===
----
{{{
option -d <device serial number>
}}}

=== Relay (-r) ===
----
{{{
option -r <1..4>
}}}

=== Relay State (-s) ===
----
{{{
option -o <on|off>
}}}

Options: on or off

=== List devices (-l) ===
----
{{{
option -l
}}}

List all FTDI devices on the system

=== Verbose (-v) ===
----
{{{
option -v
}}}

----
